eu.ehri.extension

Class AdminResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.ehri.extension.AbstractRestResource
      • eu.ehri.extension.AdminResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TxCheckedResource

    public class AdminResource
extends AbstractRestResource
    Provides additional Admin methods needed by client systems and general graph-maintenance functionality.
    Author:
    Mike Bryant (http://github.com/mikesname)

      • getGraphSON

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getGraphSON()
                                      throws Exception
        Export the DB as a stream of JSON in GraphSON format.

        The mode used is EXTENDED.

        Throws:
        Exception

      • reindexInternal

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response reindexInternal()
                                          throws Exception
        Re-build the graph's internal lucene index.

        NB: This takes a lot of memory for large graphs. Do not use willy-nilly and increase the heap size as necessary. TODO: Add incremental buffered commit.

        Throws:
        Exception

      • createDefaultUserProfile

        public javax.ws.rs.core.Response createDefaultUserProfile(String jsonData,
                                                          List<String> groups)
                                                   throws Exception
        Create a new user with a default name and identifier.
        Parameters:
        jsonData - Additional key/value data for the created object
        groups - IDs for groups to which the user should belong
        Returns:
        A new user
        Throws:
        Exception
